org.trianacode.gui.panels

Class ToolPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.trianacode.gui.panels.ToolPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ToolPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener
    A simple panel for specifying a tool name (optional), package and tool box. This can be used in various tool creation/paste into type panels.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
